ua.com.kl.cmathtutor.itcapp

Class InvisibleItemsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.com.kl.cmathtutor.itcapp.InvisibleItemsController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserProfilePresenter, UserTileComponent

    public abstract class InvisibleItemsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Specific controller, which is responsible for binding visible and managed properties over specified iterable of Nodes, so that when any of the specified Node is invisible it will not take any place within parent view container. For example of usage see UserTileComponent
